name: ThreeKingdomsHundredsHeroesLegend
description:
this is a strategy chess game ;players a king of a  ancient China dynasty "Han"

and there are others fight for the chrow with you ,summon you soldiers and kill them all ;

1,secrch castle you can got money or heros ;

2,distribution you soldiers in right way and set off for others castle 

3,move your chess and attack, use your mind to win the battle ;

4,when you are get stronger ,your enemies are get stronger too,so manage your time;

ps:   this is a brackeys game jam project made in one week;  and few bugs need to fix ;;

some times soldiers wont show in the battle ,,,,,,,,,,(we dont know how to fix this)

but you can  hit space button and end one turn ,,,,set off again and  soldiers will show

we are wecome for some feedbacks;  so have a good time  

ancient dynasty ancient dynasty
